description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Tax_RecoverabilityObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Tax_RecoverabilityObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Tax_RecoverabilityObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: The reference to the Tax Recoverability Object being updated.  For new Tax Recoverability Object, this element will not exist.

Tax_Recoverability_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Tax_Recoverability_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Tax_Recoverability_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Tax Recoverability Type cannot be changed since the Tax Recoverability is in use.

validation.validation: Percentage entered must be between 0 to 100%.

validation.validation: Allocate Non-Recoverable Tax cannot be changed since the Tax Recoverability is in use.
